(OOC: Mmmmm... *Ace Ventura impersonation* Yummy! LOL)

(OOC 2: Jeez, this has to be the .. 6th long post I've done today.. 
all my RPG's counted together, that is *_*)

(** ** are dream sequences..)



Teltoli, in her beast mode, rolled over in her sleep, now coming to 
rest on her stomach. Her eyelids flickered as she dreamed.


**Her father, BladeStryke, was standing in front of her, looking her 
straight in the optics. His body was tall and muscular, making her 
feel intimidated even though she knew her father would do nothing to 
hurt her...

"Daughter, why have you run away like a coward? I trained you in the 
ways of a warrior and you abondoned them! Abandoned me!" His voice 
rose to a shout as he lifted a hand, as if to hit her.

"No!! I didn't run away! The battle was .. was .. I don't know! I 
couldn't handle it!" She cried, holding her arms in front of her, so 
if the blows came she might be able to block them.

Suddenly her mother, Pasque, appeared next to her father, with a 
dissaproving look on her face, which was aimed towards BladeStryke. 
"Blade, she is customed to the Way of the Leaf, leave her alone"

"I'm not customed to the Way of the Leaf!" teltoli shouted, feeling 
helpless. 

BladeStryke turned to Pasque, and brought his huge battle axe and 
brought it back, for a hard blow. His eyes glittered red, and 
suddenly her mother was on the floor, on her knees, pleading with 
BladeStryke.

"NO!! FATHER! Stop!" Teltoli tried to run towards her father, but it 
seemed like her feet were stuck in cement**


The sounds of screaming animals and ripping flesh was heard 
throughout the forest, and Teltoli moaned quietly in her sleep, her 
wings rustling.


**The battle axe turned into a raptor, much to her surprise, and 
leapt upon her mother, teeth gleaming in the light and claws out, 
ready to tear her armour**


"Woah!" Teltoli leapt upright, and her eagle squawked with fright by 
her sudden movement. Her eyes darted wildly, taking in her position. 
She was in a forest, but the sounds of ripping flesh and screeches 
were still there, just a little faded. The Fuzor shuddered, and sat 
down, wondering what on Earth could be making that horrible sound.

"Just a nightmare" She muttered to herself. "A very vivid 
nightmare..". Nothing like that had ever happened to her, or her 
parents, but it was frightening just the same. She hadn't heard from 
Pasque or BladeStryke in about two years now.

Forcing herself up on her legs, she started walking slowly to the 
source of the noise. Looking up towards the tree, Teltoli noted the 
eagle was still sitting there, unsure whether to follow or not.

"Come on.. Sabre?" She winced at the name. It had been the name of 
her old friend back in battle training, but the eagle seemed to 
approve. Rustling his feathers, the eagle now dubbed 'Sabre' perched 
on her shoulder as they walked.
